fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Medical devices, Driving license, CE marking, Made In, Internet, public health...
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
European coalition for vision 
The ECV is an alliance of professional bodies, patient groups, European NGOs, disabled people's organisations, trade associations representing suppliers and research groups. Its goal is to raise the profile of eye health and vision, help prevent avoidable visual impairment and secure an equal and inclusive society for those with irreversible blindness or low vision in Europe 
http://www.ecvision.eu
goals__remit:
Our Objectives: 
- Defend and promote the industry interests 
- Be representative as much as possible of the existing European Countries Association 
- Represent the European Optical Industry in front of Europeans institutions (Committee, Parliament) and other regional optical associations (USA, ASIA...) 
 
 
Our Action: 
- Develop Quality on the market, by acting on the norms, Directives (Medical devices, Driving license,...), CE marking, Made In, Internet,... 
- Giving the people in Europe a higher quality of life and eye security by raising public awareness of eye exams and UV protection ; implementing "Vision days" and organizing Professional advertising campaigns. 
 
 
Lobbying and promotion of our interests with European Institutions 
· Follow and analyze all relevant information concerning our issues 
· Propose actions to promote the vision issues 
· Act as representative power in front of European Commission and European Parliament
